content: **about ** available in both in the round and flat versions this is a very simple eyelet mock cable ribbed hat perfect to keep your baby child or yourself warm and snuggly for those colder months a repeat of just 4 row makes for a great beginner pattern or something easy to knit when you feel like relaxing and keeping those fingers moving knit up in dk supersoft merino it will be a wonderful winter knit **skill level ** easy **recommended yarn ** patons merino extrafine dk 100% virgin merino **needle size ** 3 5mm circulars and 4mm circulars this hat is knit in the round using a magic loop method or alternatively there is a knitted flat version of this pattern **gauge ** 10x10cm = 22 stitches x 30 row stocking stitch on 4mm needles **yardage ** 50g = 120m 131yds baby sizes 1x50g balls child/adult sizes 2x50g =100g of recommended yarn **notions ** darning needle for weaving in ends tape measure scissors stitch marker **sizes ** 0-3m 3-6m 6-12m 12-24m child s child l adult
